titleStmt.title: The clerk of the surveigh surveighed, and his rigging cast. Or, A brief view taken of the book intituled, The sizes and lengths of rigging for all the states ships and frigats, lately put forth by Mr Hayward clerk of the surveigh at Chatham; the irregularities whereof are here in part discovered. By George Kendall M.A. clerk of the surveigh at Debtford and Woolwich
titleStmt.author: Kendall, George, clerk of the survey at Deptford.

By George Kendall M.A. clerk of the surveigh at Debtford and Woolwich
titleStmt.author: Kendall, George, clerk of the survey at Deptford.
